import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, DialogBackdrop, DialogPanel, DialogTitle,fetchComment } from '@headlessui/react' import useStore from "./useStore" const Section = () => { const { filteredData, fetchPost, fetchLike,fetchComment } = useStore(); const [isCommentVisible, setIsCommentVisible] = useState(false); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const handleCommentClick = () => { setIsCommentVisible(!isCommentVisible); }; const handleClick = (postId, currentLikeCount) => { const incrementedLikeCount = currentLikeCount + 1; fetchLike(postId, incrementedLikeCount); // Update the like count }; const handleSubmit=()=>{ fetchComment() } useEffect(() => { fetchPost(); }, []); return (
